dc:title: We Mourn Death of Gandhi Non Violent Revolutionary
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Eulogizes Gandhi as a pacifist martyr and a clear example of "divinized humanity." Sees his death as added to the sacrifice of Christ, sharing in the folly of the cross. Calls his way of non-violence "the full way, because he adhered to an Absolute."
